The Grey Cliffs06922fykzfffphei9nkuay5eo1040scsumc71197422014-03-28T02:28:20ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:Grey Cliffs.png|right|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of the Grey Cliffs on the continent of Westeros.]]

'''The Grey Cliffs''' are located along the coastline of northern [[Westeros]], east and north-east of [[Karhold]] in [[the North]]. The cliffs form the southern shoreline of the [[Bay of Seals]] and part of the western shore of the vast [[Shivering Sea]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/karhold/ HBO viewers guide, Season 1 map, Karhold entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/karhold/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Karhold entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Grey Cliffs are in the same location. They are controlled by [[House Karstark]].
